text: Mézidon-Canon was a commune. It was in Normandy in the Calvados department in northwest France. == History == On 9 September 1972, Mézidon merged with Canon to create Mézidon-Canon. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune Mézidon Vallée d'Auge.Arrêté préfectoral 16 September 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Mézidon-Canon
